body_html:
Interesting that you apparently got this to work successfully.

I don't have a small reproducible test case for this right now, unfortunately, so I spotted it in a sizable code base which uses cmake and has a non-trivial dependency, but I'm sure I can make one.

Your point about DatasetVariantWrapper not needing to be in the custom op library is a good one. Thanks for pointing that out. I'll look into this some more.
body_text:

body:
Interesting that you apparently got this to work successfully.

I don't have a small reproducible test case for this right now, unfortunately, so I spotted it in a sizable code base which uses cmake and has a non-trivial dependency, but I'm sure I can make one.

Your point about `DatasetVariantWrapper` not needing to be in the custom op library is a good one. Thanks for pointing that out. I'll look into this some more.
